sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {FormBuilder, Validators} from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: 'app-form', templateUrl: './form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form.component.css'] }) export class FormComponent { userForm = this.fb.group({ name: ['', [ Validators.required, // Required field validator Validators.pattern(/^[A-Za-z0-9-' ]+$/) // Regular expression pattern validator ]], number: ['', [ Validators.pattern(/^\d{13}$/) // Regular expression pattern validator for UPC code format ]], cvc: ['', [ Validators.pattern(/^\d{5}$/) // Regular expression pattern validator for UPC code format ]], date: ['', [ Validators.pattern(/^\d{5}$/) // Regular expression pattern validator for UPC code format ]], }); constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) {}; processPayment() { console.log(this.userForm.value); } }
  • Name is required.
  • Card number is required.
  • CVC Code is required.
  • Expiry date is required.
